domains_newdnszone_order_example: Example of how to add a zone:
domains_newdnszone_order_usage: Got a domain registered with another service provider, and looking to transfer it to us? To avoid any service interruptions, you can add a DNS zone before you begin transferring the domain name.
domains_newdnszone_order_reminder: Remember to change the DNS servers, so that the zone is taken into account.
domains_newdnszone_order_subtitle: to configure your domain for your different services.
domains_newdnszone_zone_invalid_title: You can only create a DNS zone if the following criteria are met:
domains_newdnszone_zone_invalid_domain_a: The domain exists and it is active
domains_newdnszone_zone_invalid_domain_s: The domain's SOA must be correctly set up in its DNS zone
domains_newdnszone_zone_invalid_domain_a: There must be no actions in progress at OVHcloud for this domain
domains_newdnszone_zone_invalid_domain_z: This DNS zone cannot already be registered with OVHcloud
domains_newdnszone_order_success: Your DNS zone has been enabled
domains_newdnszone_order_error: An error has occurred ordering the DNS zone: {{ message }}
